entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
